name: Chandelure
author: Tomokazu Komiya
flavor_text: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.

abilities.name: Sinister Selection
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Discard the other card.

attacks.name: Past Friends
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 more damage for each Supporter card in your discard pile.
